partnerships.description: Lehigh University is pleased to partner with the Technical University of Dortmund (Technische UniversitÃ¤t Dortmund) located in Germany. We collaborate in the following areas: student exchange, research collaborations,and the exchange of faculty and academic materials. This partnership was established in 1998. Additionally, Lehigh collaborates with TU Dortmund through the University Alliance Ruhr, the Iacocca Institute International Internship Program, the Global Entrepreneurship Research,Entrepreneurship and Innovation Consortium, and the Global Staff Fellows virtual staff exchange program.

partnerships.description: Lehigh University is pleased to partner with Nara Women's University located in Japan. Nara Women's University (NWU) hosts Lehigh students during their winter course, NWU and LU have a student exchange agreement, and NWU has students apply for, and accepted to, the TOMODACHI Women in Stem research program through Lehigh each winter. This partnership was established in 2021.
